actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to extend its coverage and protection to employees of nonprofit hospitals.

summary.text: Extends the coverage of the National Labor Relations Act to employees of nonprofit hospitals. Defines the term "health care institution" for purposes of this Act. Sets forth collective bargaining notice, mediation and agreement procedures to govern employees of a health care institution.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to extend its coverage and protection to employees of nonprofit hospitals.
